title: Serious Team Looking for High Platinum Rank Jungler Main or Higher for ACL Open Ladder Tournements
body:
G'day all, my team and I were looking for a Jungler main so that we'd be able to compete in next week's autumn OOL tournament which can be found at this link: http://aclpro.com.au/events/2015/online/lol/ool/ool2/autumn-ool-series.html

We'd prefer it if applicants were of platinum ranking or higher, but we are willing to look into anyone that is interested. We're not a toxic team and we'd like to keep it that was as much as possible. Above all, we're looking for motivated and committed teammates that are willing to turn up to team practises and tournament times. 

On that note, if you are interested, feel free to comment below with your Summoner name or add me on League (IGN "AdTueri")

replies.body:
Ign: colour shade 
Division: plat 1 jungler
Diamond jungle Mr Scarecrow, fiddle main always online
You're well known for toxcidity to anyone low diamond high bronze
Whats up, IGN is jalencrawford, I main jungle and am currently plat 3.
ingame name is S0lution. I am adaptable and good at every role. Don't have specifics due to solo queue haha. Plat 5. Can main jungle if that's what you need, am happy to trial.
add me my name is Rapiids i am bronze 4
yer yo man im plat main jungle add me Mr Froggy
